ygData.subject: Re: novice questions
ygData.msgSnippet: WellI am a human cleric they are good but the best clerics that i have encountered yet are Dwarfs they are excellent fighters(though clerics are not pure
ygData.messageBody:
WellI am a human cleric they are good but the best clerics that i have
encountered yet are Dwarfs they are excellent fighters(though clerics are
not pure fighters they are made to be fighters) they are tough and have
nightsight or somethin like that but the main point is they are great
fighters.Umm give them about 90 str and about 105intt or whatever clerics
use i thinkl its inteligance but go here to get charater creation info
www.eqvault.com this is the best site for up coming events if you have any
questions just email me.

Krix Mathar,
<High Priest >
-----Original Message-----
From: Curtis Bennett <cbennett@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 7:36 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] novice questions


>From: Curtis Bennett <cbennett@...>
>
>Hi, I just bought EQ (my friends talked me into it)
>and they wanted me to play a Cleric - which fortunately
>is what I always play anyway because I like them. I read
>through some of the archives here, and I have a few
>questions:
>
>What is the best race for the cleric? I made a high-elf.
>Are they good? It seemed to have the highest wisdom.
>
>It looks like strength is really important? What is a
>good minimum strength.
>
>thanks for the help.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>
